name: Chat
description: Chat bubbles, groups, and tail helpers for conversational layouts.

use: you need chat bubble styling with tails or grouped messages.
you want consistent spacing and alignment in chat threads.
avoid: a basic list of cards is enough.

patterns.title: Grouped messages with avatar
patterns.code:
ChatGroup(
  avatarPrefix: const Avatar(initials: 'JD'),
  children: const [
    ChatBubble(child: Text('Hi there')),
    ChatBubble(child: Text('How can I help?')),
  ],
)

patterns.title: Bubble types
patterns.code:
ChatBubble(
  type: ChatBubbleType.plain,
  child: const Text('Plain bubble'),
)

theming: `ChatTheme` and `ChatGroupTheme` control colors, spacing, and alignment.
accessibility: Provide semantic labels for avatars when needed.
do: Use `ChatGroup` to keep bubble spacing consistent.
dont: Mix multiple bubble types within the same group without intent.
